verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G2076>he<s%> that was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> of <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>, Prepare <S%G2090>ye<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G908>baptism<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, O <S%G1081>generation<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers<s%>, <S%G5101>who<s%> hath <S%G5263>warned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> to our <S%G3962>father<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> to raise <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> unto <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G513>axe<s%> is <S%G2749>laid<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G4491>root<s%> of the <S%G1186>trees<s%>: <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> which <S%G4160>bringeth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is hewn <S%G1581>down<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> mightier <S%G2478>than<s%> <S%G3450>I<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to <S%G941>bear<s%>: <S%G846>he<s%> shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G4425>fan<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he will throughly <S%G1245>purge<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G257>floor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G596>garner<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> he will burn <S%G2618>up<s%> the <S%G892>chaff<s%> with <S%G762>unquenchable<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> it to be so now <S%G737><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> thus <S%G3779><s%> it becometh <S%G4241%G2076><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to fulfil <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> righteousness. <S%G1343><s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> he <S%G863>suffered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, when he was <S%G907>baptized<s%>, went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G2117>straightway<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>lo<s%>, the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> were <S%G455>opened<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>lighting<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>:
